name: Spectral Thieves
description:
As there came increasing press of someone nicknamed "Grinman" scamming people by selling shady products, a group of thieves decided to take action and stop Grinman.

They were lead by a man in a ninja attire and thanks to their impressive team work, they managed to tack Grinman and infiltrate his headquarters. The man in the ninja attire decided to go on his own with the assistance of the hacker of the team.

Coding/Art/Design: Prownie
Animation: Joe

Controls (they can be changed in the menu):

  • WASD - Move character
  • Space - Jump (to go faster)
  • E - Interact/Continue dialogue
